languages.text: {n}Статный эльдарский воин выходит вперед, оглядывая спокойным взглядом вторженцев. Его броня и украшения сияют на солнце, несмотря на следы спекшейся крови и грязи.{/n} "Провидцы велели отправить вас прочь, мон-кай". {n}Бархатистый голос ксеноса звучит чужеродно в диких лесах Кетца Темера.{/n} "Однако с недавних пор я перестал безропотно следовать их советам. К тому же среди вас моя сестра... Мне любопытно, что за весть несет Изгой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Статный эльдарский воин выходит вперед, оглядывая спокойным взглядом вторженцев. Его броня и украшения сияют на солнце, несмотря на следы спекшейся крови и грязи.{/n} "Провидцы велели отправить вас прочь, мон-кай". {n}Бархатистый голос ксеноса звучит чужеродно в диких лесах Кетца-аль Хета.{/n} "Однако с недавних пор я перестал безропотно следовать их советам. К тому же среди вас моя сестра... Мне любопытно, что за весть несет Изгой".

languages.text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "The Farseers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their counsel, and besides, my sister is among you... I am curious to hear the Outcast's tidings."
languages.original_text: {n}Статный эльдарский воин выходит вперед, оглядывая спокойным взглядом вторженцев. Его броня и украшения сияют на солнце, несмотря на следы спекшейся крови и грязи.{/n} "Провидцы велели отправить вас прочь, мон-кай". {n}Бархатистый голос ксеноса звучит чужеродно в диких лесах Кетца Темера.{/n} "Однако с недавних пор я перестал безропотно следовать их советам. К тому же среди вас моя сестра... Мне любопытно, что за весть несет Изгой".

traits.locale_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked blood.{/n} "The seers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their council, and besides, there is my sister among you... I am curious what the Exile's message is."

His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "The Farseers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their counsel, and besides, my sister is among you... I am curious to hear the Outcast's tidings."

languages.text: {n}Un majestuoso guerrero Aeldari da un paso al frente y mira a los intrusos con expresión tranquila. Su armadura y sus ornamentos relucen a la luz del sol pese a las manchas de barro seco y sangre apelmazada.{/n} «Los videntes me han aconsejado que te eche de aquí, mon-keigh». {n}La suave voz del xenos parece fuera de lugar en la agreste espesura de Quetza Temer.{/n} «Pero últimamente ya no obedezco a ciegas su consejo; además, una de mis hermanas viene contigo... y siento curiosidad por saber qué nuevas me trae esta proscrita».
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "The Farseers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their counsel, and besides, my sister is among you... I am curious to hear the Outcast's tidings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un majestuoso guerrero Aeldari da un paso al frente y mira a los intrusos con expresión tranquila. Su armadura y sus ornamentos relucen a la luz del sol pese a las manchas de barro seco y sangre apelmazada.{/n} «Los videntes me han aconsejado que te eche de aquí, mon-keigh». {n}La suave voz del xenos parece fuera de lugar en la agreste espesura de Quetza Temer.{/n} «Pero últimamente ya no obedezco a ciegas su consejo; además, una de mis hermanas viene contigo... y siento curiosidad por saber qué mensaje me trae esta proscrita».

languages.text: {n}一位面目庄严的艾达灵族战士走上前来，平静地看着入侵者。尽管他的盔甲和饰品沾着干泥与血迹，但依然在阳光下闪闪发光。{/n}“先知吩咐我把你赶走，猴子。”{n}这位异形优雅流畅的声音，与格扎尔特默的粗犷荒野显得格格不入。{/n}“不过，我最近已经不再听从他们的劝诫了。对了，我的姐妹也在你身边……我很愿意听听那位流浪者带来了什么讯息。”
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "The Farseers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their counsel, and besides, my sister is among you... I am curious to hear the Outcast's tidings."

traits.locale_text: {n}一位面目庄严的艾达灵族战士走上前来，平静地看着入侵者。尽管他的盔甲和饰品沾着干泥与血迹，但依然在阳光下闪闪发光。{/n}“先知吩咐我把你赶走，猴子。”{n}这位异形优雅流畅的声音，与格扎尔特默的粗犷荒野显得格格不入。{/n}“不过，我最近已经不再听从他们的劝诫了。对了，我的姐妹也在你身边……我很好奇那位流浪者带来了什么消息。”

languages.text: {n}Un majestueux guerrier aeldari s'avance en observant calmement les intrus. Son armure et ses ornements brillent au soleil malgré la boue et le sang séché qui les souillent.{/n} « Les Grands Prophètes m'ont demandé de vous chasser d'ici, mon-keigh. » {n}Sa voix douce contraste vivement avec les terres sauvages de Quetza Temer.{/n} « Toutefois, j'ai récemment cessé d'obéir docilement à leurs instructions, et ma sœur vous accompagne... J'aimerais connaître le message de l'Errante. »
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "The Farseers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their counsel, and besides, my sister is among you... I am curious to hear the Outcast's tidings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un majestueux guerrier aeldari s'avance en observant calmement les intrus. Son armure et ses ornements brillent au soleil malgré la boue et le sang séché qui les souillent.{/n} « Les prophètes m'ont demandé de vous chasser d'ici, mon-keigh. » {n}Sa voix douce contraste vivement avec les terres sauvages de Quetza Temer.{/n} « Toutefois, j'ai récemment cessé d'obéir docilement à leurs instructions, et ma sœur vous accompagne... J'aimerais connaître le message de l'Errante. »

languages.text: {n}風格のあるアエルダリの戦士が一歩前に進み、落ち着いて侵入者たちに目を向ける。彼の鎧と装飾品は、乾いた泥と、こびりついた血の跡があるにもかかわらず、太陽の光を受けて輝いている。{/n}「モン＝ケイ、予見者は、お前を追い払うように言った」{n}ゼノの滑らかな声は、ケツァ・テメルの荒々しい自然にはそぐわないものだ。{/n}「だが、私はこのところ、彼らの言葉に大人しく耳を傾けるのをやめたのだ。それに、お前とともに我らが妹がいるだろう…その、追放者の携えた知らせが気になるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "The Farseers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their counsel, and besides, my sister is among you... I am curious to hear the Outcast's tidings."

traits.locale_text: {n}風格のあるアエルダリの戦士が一歩前に進み、落ち着いて侵入者たちに目を向ける。彼の鎧と装飾品は、乾いた泥と、こびりついた血の跡があるにもかかわらず、太陽の光を受けて輝いている。{/n}「モン＝ケイ、予見者は、お前を追い払うように言った」{n}ゼノの滑らかな声は、ケツァ・テメルの荒々しい自然にはそぐわないものだ。{/n}「だが、私はこのところ、彼らの言葉に大人しく耳を傾けるのをやめたのだ。それに、お前とともに我らが妹がいるだろう…その、追放者の携えたメッセージが気になるのだ」

languages.text: {n}Ein herrschaftlicher Aeldari-Krieger tritt vor und blickt ruhig auf die Eindringlinge. Seine Rüstung und ihre Dekorationen glänzen in der Sonne, trotz des getrockneten Schlamms und Bluts.{/n} "Die Runenpropheten haben mich angewiesen, Euch fortzuschicken, Chem-Pan-Sey." {n}Die samtene Stimme des Xenos klingt in der rauen Wildnis von Quetza Temer fehl am Platz.{/n} "Ich habe jedoch kürzlich begonnen, ihren Rat nicht mehr einfach brav zu befolgen. Zudem habt Ihr meine Schwester ... Ich bin neugierig, wie die Botschaft der Ausgestoßenen lautet."
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "The Farseers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their counsel, and besides, my sister is among you... I am curious to hear the Outcast's tidings."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein herrschaftlicher Aeldari-Krieger tot vor und blickt ruhig auf die Eindringlinge. Seine Rüstung und ihre Dekorationen glänzen in der Sonne, trotz des getrockneten Schlamms und Bluts.{/n} "Die Seher haben mich angewiesen, Euch fortzuschicken, Chem-Pan-Sey." {n}Die samtene Stimme des Xenos klingt in der rauen Wildnis von Quetza Temer fehl am Platz.{/n} "Ich habe jedoch kürzlich begonnen, ihren Rat nicht mehr einfach brav zu befolgen. Zudem habt Ihr meine Schwester ... Ich bin neugierig, wie die Botschaft der Ausgestoßenen lautet."

languages.text: {n}Heybetli bir Aeldari savaşçısı, öne doğru bir adım atarak sakince istilacılara bakıyor. Zırhıyla işlemeleri, kurumuş çamur ve taşlaşmış kan lekelerine rağmen güneşte ışıldıyor.{/n} "Ötesezenler, seni göndermemi emretti mon-keigh." {n}Zenonun pürüzsüz sesinin Quetza Temer'in acımasız yaban hayatıyla ters düşen bir tınısı var.{/n} "Ancak kısa süre önce nasihatlerine uysalca itaat etmeyi kestim. Ayrıca kız kardeşim de aranızda... Yurtsuz'dan havadisler almayı sabırsızlıkla bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "The Farseers instructed me to send you away, mon-keigh." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "However, I recently stopped meekly heeding their counsel, and besides, my sister is among you... I am curious to hear the Outcast's tidings."

Zırhıyla işlemeleri, kurumuş çamur ve taşlaşmış kan lekelerine rağmen güneşte ışıldıyor.{/n} "Ötesezenler, seni göndermemi emretti mon-keigh." {n}Zenonun pürüzsüz sesinin Quetza Temer'in acımasız yaban hayatıyla ters düşen bir tınısı var.{/n} "Ancak kısa süre önce nasihatlerine uysalca itaat etmeyi kestim. Ayrıca kız kardeşim de aranızda... Yurtsuz'dan havadisler almayı sabırsızlıkla bekliyorum."
